About Me

I am a 19-year-old college student enrolled in the MSc Integrated program at Anna University, Chennai, specifically at the esteemed College of Engineering Guindy. My academic journey reflects a strong commitment to education and personal growth. I have already developed a solid grasp of MERN stack development, a modern web application framework encompassing MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Additionally, I am proficient in Android app development, showcasing my ability to create functional and user-friendly mobile applications. Being part of Anna University, renowned for its academic excellence, underscores my dedication to learning. With a unique blend of technical skills, including MERN stack and Android development, I am poised to make a meaningful contribution in the ever-evolving tech landscape.
